lead_paragraph: PAPERT--Fred. The Board and Staff of The New York Landmarks Conservancy mourn the passing of our former Board Member. Fred's vision, passion and determination were directed at improving civic life and preserving the best of the City. Lloyd P. Zuckerberg, Chair Peg Breen, President 1/3
